      • run

        public void run(java.lang.String[] args,
                java.io.InputStream stdin,
                java.io.OutputStream stdout)
         throws WcException
        Runs the wc application with the specified arguments.
        Specified by:
        run in interface Application
        Parameters:
        args - Array of arguments for the application. Each array element is the path to a file. If no files are specified stdin is used.
        stdin - An InputStream. The input for the command is read from this InputStream if no files are specified.
        stdout - An OutputStream. The output of the command is written to this OutputStream.
        Throws:
        WcException - Exception for WcApplication

        isWords - Boolean option to count the number of words
        fileName - Array of String of file names

        Throws:
